description: Detects a write of an Exchange CSR to an untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell Author: Max Altgelt. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Certificate Request Export to Exchange Webserver
query: ((*New\-ExchangeCertificate* AND *\ \-GenerateRequest* AND *\ \-BinaryEncoded* AND *\ \-RequestFile*) AND (*\\\\localhost\\C$* OR *\\\\127.0.0.1\\C$* OR *C\:\\inetpub* OR *.aspx*))
